Notes: typical VO;睡了一大觉，睡睡觉
上了两个小时网，上上网
见了一面；常用：跟/和/与/同+NP 见面；不说“见NP面”
帮了他一个大忙，帮帮忙；可直接插代词：帮他忙；“帮他的忙”也可但更领属
吵了一架；常用：跟/和/与/同+NP 吵架；不说“吵NP架”
打了一架；常用：跟/和/与/同+NP 打架；不说“打NP架”
打了一仗；可说：跟/和/与/同+NP 打了一仗；不说“打NP仗”(在离合词拆分构式下)
生他的气；更自然：生他的气；口语可省“的”
道了一个歉；常用“向/对/给+人”道歉
道了一声谢；常用“向/对/给+人”道谢

English Definition: to pay a New Year call

Notes: 捣他的乱；插入人称代词时通常要“的”：捣他的乱
开了一个玩笑，开开玩笑；常见：跟你开玩笑；或开你的玩笑(需“的”)
谈了一场恋爱，谈谈恋爱
撒了一个谎；可用“对/跟/向+人”撒谎(可省)
告了他一状；可用“向/跟/到+人”告状(可省)
吃谁的醋；多用“(谁)的”：吃他的醋/吃谁的醋，吃飞醋
加了三个小时班，加加班

English Definition: to go on a business trip

Notes: 学个习;学不了一点习，学学习

Lemma: # EXT:...  = External realization: a PP attaches to the whole predicate (outside the split VO domain).
# INT:...  = Internal constraint: what is (not) allowed inside the split between head V and tail O.
#   A comitative PP (“with/together with”) introducing a co-participant / opponent / companion.
#   OPTIONAL  = possible but adjunct-like (can be omitted without changing argument structure)
#   PREFERRED = the canonical / most natural way to express that participant for this lemma
#   REQUIRED  = essentially obligatory to express that participant (rare; use only if truly forced)
#   A PP marking the target/addressee the action is directed to.
#   The lemma disallows a bare direct NP object inside the split pattern (*V NP O is ungrammatical or strongly dispreferred).
#   A pronoun/NP may be inserted as a direct object inside the split (V NP O)
#   The participant is more naturally expressed as possessive (often with 的)
#   Possessive marking is required; a bare object pronoun inside the split is not acceptable.
